mapper.insert: insert into article(articleid , title , image , contents , addtime , hits ) values(#{articleid} , #{title} , #{image} , #{contents} , #{addtime} , #{hits} )
mapper.update: update article set title=#{title} , image=#{image} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} , hits=#{hits} where articleid=#{articleid}
mapper.select: select a.* from article a order by articleid desc
select a.* from article a order by articleid desc limit 10
select a.* from article a where articleid=#{articleid} order by articleid desc

select a.* from article a where 1=1
and a.title like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{title}, '%'))
and a.image like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{image}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.hits like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{hits}, '%'))
